news.title: OKX Ventures backs RWA stablecoin with Securitize, Hamilton Lane
news.titleOriginal: OKX Ventures backs RWA stablecoin with Securitize, Hamilton Lane
news.summary: The dual-token structure seeks to sidestep US restrictions on yield-bearing stablecoins by separating returns from the stable unit itself.

news.title: UK government appoints HSBC for tokenized bond pilot
news.titleOriginal: UK government appoints HSBC for tokenized bond pilot
news.summary: The UK appointed HSBC Orion for its DIGIT pilot to explore blockchain bonds, aiming to improve efficiency, cut costs and boost security.

news.title: Gen Z flirts with crypto to pay for dates this Valentine’s, survey finds
news.titleOriginal: Gen Z flirts with crypto to pay for dates this Valentine’s, survey finds
news.summary: An OKX-commissioned Pollfish survey finds 13% of Gen Z have paid for dates with crypto, while many non-users cite a lack of a direct way to do so.

news.title: Bankers push OCC to slow crypto trust charters until GENIUS rules clarified
news.titleOriginal: Bankers push OCC to slow crypto trust charters until GENIUS rules clarified
news.summary: The American Bankers Association pressed the OCC to delay new national trust bank charters for crypto and stablecoin firms until the GENIUS Act framew

news.title: Binance completes $1B Bitcoin conversion for SAFU emergency fund
news.titleOriginal: Binance completes $1B Bitcoin conversion for SAFU emergency fund
news.summary: Binance completed its $1 billion Bitcoin conversion for its emergency user fund as crypto sentiment hit record lows and smart money traders increased
